name: Planet of the Aviforms
description:
A/D or Arrow Keys to Move

Space to Jump

Left Mouse Button, E or Enter to Fire

P to Pause

Sir David the Learned has been stranded while researching the fire-resistant, birdlike life-forms on a strange volcanic planet. Can you help him escape?

Design, Art, Coding by Alexander Kazazis https://fallingwallgames.itch.io

Music from the Ultimate Game Music Collection (Unity Asset Store)

Color palette: Coral Reef by Xandre https://lospec.com/palette-list/coral-reef

Created in 3 days for Minijam 99, February 2022.

Theme: Birds

Limitation: Can't Stop Moving

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-99-birds
